title: "Shivani Chowdhry"

Shivani Chowdhry is a Ph.D. candidate in Public Policy and Political Economy at the University of Texas at Dallas. She is also currently persuing a Master's degree in Social Data Analytics and Research at University of Texas at Dallas. Prior to this, she worked in the editorial team of Ideas for India during 2016-2020. She holds a Master's in economics from Jamia Millia Islamia College, New Delhi, and a Bachelor's in economics and mathematics from Lady Shri Ram College, Delhi University. Her research focuses on the effects of air pollution on the mental health and well-being of people in developing countries.

**Research Interests:**

-   Global health policy

-   Environment policy

-   Mental health and well-being

-   Sustainability
